channel.title: How do i create forums?
channel.description: Ok so how do i create forums and upload my client to it? and how can i take my forums down if i ever need to? plz someone help

item.title: How do i create forums?
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Use www.byethost.com (VistaPanel) get your own domain, and set forums up in htdocs…its god damn easy…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i create forums?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:19, topic:305772”][quote author=Anfernio link=topic=402004.msg2982939#msg2982939 date=1254715637]

smfforfree is terrible, NEVER use it

this is the best possible choice for a forum without having to pay a cent:

Go to http://www.000webhost.com or buy your own domain.
Upload your zipped forums that you can download from http://www.simplemachines.org/
Set up an SQL database and set up the rest of your forums, done.

there are probably better free hosting websites out there, though

Aren’t these forums smfforfree?
[/quote]
lmao no there simplemachines. smfforfree are way to messy[/quote]… wow

Read full topic

item.title: How do i create forums?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:11, topic:305772”][quote author=Kihomura link=topic=402004.msg2980066#msg2980066 date=1254560832]
Go to http://www.000webhost.com or buy your own domain.
Upload your zipped forums that you can download from http://www.simplemachines.org/
Set up an SQL database and set up the rest of your forums, done.
[/quote]He has no clue what any of that is Kiho. Btw, 000webhost’s FTP protocol is horrible and you can’t even connect half the time. (with Filezilla anyways) And it’s all about phpBB not smf.

If you’re just starting, smfforfree.com is the place to start.[/quote]
Though that is true, no one joins with shitty smfforfree forums.
So if you want a community with 4 members.
www.smfforfree.com

Read full topic

If you’re just starting, smfforfree.com is the place to start.
